about_the_game:
Complete your Adventure through the Sega eras with the Superdimension Neptune Vs Sega Hard Girls Deluxe Pack! Requires Superdimension Neptune VS Sega Hard Girls for Steam to run.

Includes:
- Sketch Art Book
- OST w/ Booklet
- PC Desktop Wallpapers
- Mobile Wallpapers
detailed_description:
Complete your Adventure through the Sega eras with the Superdimension Neptune Vs Sega Hard Girls Deluxe Pack! Requires Superdimension Neptune VS Sega Hard Girls for Steam to run.

Includes:

- PC Desktop Wallpapers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 3 GHz Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10.x or OpenGL 3.3 or better graphics card with 1 GB RAM and support for v4 shaders
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10.x compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Caution: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000 series, AMD processor may not work properly with this game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4460 CPU @ 3.20GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10.x compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Caution: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000 series, AMD processor may not work properly with this game.

short_description: Complete your Adventure through the Sega eras with the Superdimension Neptune Vs Sega Hard Girls Deluxe Pack! Requires Superdimension Neptune VS Sega Hard Girls for Steam to run.
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
